title: Markets Edge Higher Following Fed’s 25-bp Rate Cut | The Close 12/10/2025
description: Bloomberg Television brings you the latest news and analysis leading up to the final minutes and seconds before and after the closing bell on Wall Street. Today's guests are DoubleLine Capital’s Ken Shinoda, Jefferies’ Brent Thill, CLEO Capital’s Sarah Kunst, AllianceBernstein’s William Smith, Formal Boston Fed President Eric Rosengren. (Source: Bloomberg)
